category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_valid_download_file_types
preference.preference_description: Specifies the International Material Data System (IMDS) file types. These values are used by the "imds_download_process_files" utility. For valid file types, refer to the International Material Data System (IMDS) document.
